Locus.name: Locus
Locus.description:
Locus is a free, open source app for Android and iOS that allows you to share your location live. It encrypts your location end-to-end, meaning that no one, not even we, can read it. It stores the location decentralized on multiple servers of your choice using Nostr, meaning that you are not locked to a service. No authentication required.

NOTE: This source is not verified by or affiliated with Myzel394 or any other Locus developers.
Locus.changelog:
This release contains improvements and bugfixes mainly.

## What's Changed
* Display own location by @Myzel394 in https://github.com/Myzel394/locus/pull/130
* Add share name change by @Myzel394 in https://github.com/Myzel394/locus/pull/131
* Make Timers sheet grow on height change by @Myzel394 in https://github.com/Myzel394/locus/pull/133


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Myzel394/locus/compare/v0.15.1...v0.15.2
